title: SHOCKER: Adult Film Stars LOSE BET . . . Now That Have To Perform Certain . . . ‘ACTS’ On More Than A Hundred Fans!!
text:
Search for: Feb 06 2017 SHOCKER: Adult Film Stars LOSE BET . . . Now That Have To Perform Certain . . . ‘ACTS’ On More Than A Hundred Fans!! February 6, 2017 : Two adult film stars are going to have to GIVE IT UP – after losing a Superbowl Bet. The two ladies, Lauren Phillips and Carmen Valentina, are part of #TEAMBJ – an event that will see them perform sex acts on strangers.
The stunt has been running since 2010, allowing fans to get up close and personal with their favourite performers. 
A DVD will be released later this year of the event. 
A previous #TEAMBJ saw Sara Jay and Siri line up after Germany won the World Cup. MORE GREAT STORIES FROM 
Valentima said: “This is my first ever #TeamBJ so I have no idea what to expect. 
“I am nervous and excited at the same time. I will be on the edge of my seat the entire game. 
“I’d love to give Bill Belichick a BJ if the Patriots win… he hardly ever smiles.” © 2017 MediaTakeOut
